c74object.name: rapidmax
c74object.digest: A machine learning object for gesture-sound interaction design
c74object.description: A machine learning object that provides a set of supervised machine learning algorithms for gesture-sound interaction design. By implementing multilayer perceptron (MLP) artificial neural networks (ANN), it allows to train linear regression and k-nearest neighbour classification models between multiple dimensions of input and target output.

method.name: regress
method.digest: Train a neural network to predict values inbetween data points.
method.description: The message 'regress', followed by the name of a dict to which rapidmax adddress the holding training set data, will train a neural network to predict values inbetween data points.

method.name: classify
method.digest: Train a k-nearest neighbor classifier to predict the closest data point.
method.description: The message 'classify', followed by the name of a dict to which rapidmax adddress the holding training set data,will train a k-nearest neighbor classifier to predict the closest data point.
